org.jgentleframework.integration.scripting.annotation
Annotation Type ScriptingInject

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ScriptingInject

This annotation provides configuration information for Scripting services.

Author:
gnut

Required Element Summary
 ScriptingType lang
          The scripting language
 java.lang.String scriptFile
          The specified scripting file
 
Optional Element Summary
 PathType pathType
          The specified path type of scriptFile() attribute.
 

Element Detail

scriptFile

public abstract java.lang.String scriptFile
The specified scripting file

lang

public abstract ScriptingType lang
The scripting language

See Also:
ScriptingType

pathType

public abstract PathType pathType
The specified path type of scriptFile() attribute.

Default value is PathType.CLASSPATH

Default:
org.jgentleframework.configure.enums.PathType.CLASSPATH
